speaker: char
text: Lovely job! Oh my, I look so pretty, thank you so much.

speaker: char
text: This is really making me happy, just looking at myself in the mirror. Is that bad?

speaker: char
text: I could really be happy just doing things for myself, you know? Does that make me selfish?

speaker: char
text: Anyway, once more unto the breech, as they say. Maybe this time it will be okay.
